programme.title: Dead Uncle
programme.desc: Cristian, who has no job and no desire to find one, has only one way out: to retrieve the urine of a jaguar in the remote Apulian countryside to carry out a very dangerous mission.

programme.title: So Young, So Lovely, So Vicious...
programme.desc: Gloria Guida is the cheeky teenager Angela, daughter of the widower Dr. Batrucchi. When she meets her father's new companion, Irene, taken in dislike she attempts by various subterfuges to discredit her in the man's eyes. But Angela soon discovers a stain in Irene's past: lesbian tendencies and a stormy relationship with a high school teacher, leading the latter to suicide.

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: After making his historic crossing of the Alps with elephants transporting supplies and troops, Hannibal marches on Rome in a war of revenge. The presence of Silvia, niece of Quintus Fabius Maximus, creates clashes in his camp.

programme.title: The body
programme.desc: A chilling mystery surrounding a woman's death unravels as a detective investigates a complex case.

programme.title: Shoot First, Die Later
programme.desc: Domenico Malacarne is a police commissioner colluding with the criminal underworld, which takes advantage of his corrupt dealings to obtain lavish earnings. Gradually, however, he realises that the mafia is going too far, and begins to hinder his operations, antagonising them. When his fiancée is killed, Domenico knows it is a scam. But he is nevertheless determined to declare his personal war!

programme.title: Queen of the Nile
programme.desc: Tanith, the daughter of Grand Sacedote must marry the heir to the throne despite the fact that she loves the sculptor Tumos. Passion returns between the two lovers but the woman shrugs it off in the face of the threat of revolt.

programme.title: Looking for Paradise
programme.desc: Inspired by Vite di uomini non illustri by Giuseppe Pontiggia and directed by Mario Monicelli, this film follows Claudia Bertelli, born in Milan in 1949 to a middle-class family. Educated in England, Claudia's life unfolds through diverse roles: rebellious single mother, feminist, wife, doctor in developing countries, and finally a mystical nun. Each phase reflects changing ideals, forming a portrait of a woman exploring identity across different stages of her life.

programme.title: Murder Obsession
programme.desc: Michael Stanford, a promising young actor, suffers from the stress caused by his job. Fatigue creates large gaps in his memory and makes him unstable character-wise. Therefore, Michael decides to retreat to his mother's house, inviting the entire film crew as well.

programme.title: Scalps
programme.desc: The commander of a Texan fort in the Civil War tries to buy the local Indian tribe chief's daughter. The noble squaw manages to escape, and hides out with a rough rancher, who dislikes Indians, but hates the Southerners more.

programme.title: The body
programme.desc: A chilling mystery surrounding a woman's death unravels as a detective investigates a complex case.

programme.title: Shoot First, Die Later
programme.desc: Domenico Malacarne is a police commissioner colluding with the criminal underworld, which takes advantage of his corrupt dealings to obtain lavish earnings. Gradually, however, he realises that the mafia is going too far, and begins to hinder his operations, antagonising them. When his fiancée is killed, Domenico knows it is a scam. But he is nevertheless determined to declare his personal war!

programme.desc: Tanith, the daughter of Grand Sacedote must marry the heir to the throne despite the fact that she loves the sculptor Tumos. Passion returns between the two lovers but the woman shrugs it off in the face of the threat of revolt.
